mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL( OR_NO, OR_UID, PR_NO, GC_NO, OR_DATE, OR_TYPE, OR_PRICE, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(OR_NO),0)+1 FROM ORDER_DETAIL O), #{or_uid}, 0, #{gc_no}, sysdate, '0', #{or_price}, '닉네임 세션값이 들어감', '이메일 세션값이 들어감' )
mapper.select: SELECT O.OR_UID, C.GC_DATE, C.GC_TYPE, O.OR_DATE, O.OR_PRICE, C.GC_NAME, C.C_EMAIL, C.GC_TITLE,C.GC_TIME FROM ORDER_DETAIL O JOIN GROUP_COUNSEL C ON (O.GC_NO = C.GC_NO) WHERE OR_NO = #{or_no}
mapper.insert: insert into order_detail( or_no, or_uid, pr_no, gc_no, or_date, or_type, or_price, m_nickname, m_email ) values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(or_no),0)+1 FROM order_detail N), #{or_uid}, #{pr_no}, 0, sysdate, '아직안옴', #{or_price}, '세션값 이름 입니다.', '세션값 이메일 입니다' )
